template: Forklift Request Queue (FIFO)

name: function 7
function 8
function 9
function 17

query:
from(bucket: "forklift")
  |> range(start: -1d)  // or use a shorter time window like -1d, depending on your need
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "acceptedMach")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "duration" or r._field == "machine")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.average_sec;
return msg;

name: function 19
function 20
func:

name: function 21
func:

name: function 5
func:
msg.payload = msg.audio;
return msg;
